lines.text:
[after the Klan has crashed Rev. Flavel's revival, bald, naked and circumcised]
Behold the Spawn of Satan! The Bowels of Perdition. Hear what I say! I speak Salvation! I speak Redemption!

[instructing Tommy Turner to turn on the tape recorder]
Now.
CLEARLY I say this to thee...
Holy Shit! Look at the dick on that son of a bitch!
Hey, Mayor! That guy's dork's even bigger that yours!
If you had a dick like that, you could give your secretary a flying@#$%.
Look at that snatch!
Oh My God!
[faints]
Oh, Mother.
Hey, Mayor. Does Reverend Flavel approve of THIS?

[to Mayor]
You Scum!
Approve? Are you kidding? Reverend Flavel GAVE me this one!
[audience starts booing loudly]
Blaspehmy! Shakespeare must go! So sayeth the Shepherd!
SO SAYETH THE FLOCK!
And what sayeth you, Mr. Carter?

[very angry at this point]
Get the Flock out of here!
[the students all start cheering]
This means war! HOLY WAR! Flock! FOLLOW!
Hey waiter! Put shit-face's drink here on Commissioner Gebhart's bill! For piss-sake he's up for re-election next week, you think he needs this shit?

[to Commissioned Gebhart before taking his picture]
Say "I'm Ruined!"
I'm so hot! I want all of you guys. But especially you!
[indicating Pee Wee]
[drunken and dressed as a zombie]
Brian, really, who do I look like?

[agitated]
For the third time... Boris Karloff as "The Mummy".
What's this?
Blueprints.
I know they're blueprints. What are they of.
Take a look.
Okay, here the school.
[Tommy pulls out a metal container, opens it, and pulls a snake out of it.]
Okay, so this is the gym.
Right.
So now what?

[Puts the snake in his view]
So we take this snake...

[Throws down the blueprints, backs up frantically, screaming]
Jesus Christ! What the hell are you doing?! Get that out of my face!
You don't like snakes?
I hate snakes! You know I hate snakes! Jesus!
[Indicating Balbricker]
What are you going to do, kill her?

[Puts the snake back]
No, it's just a rat snake. It's not poisonous.

[Cringing]
Yaah!

[After opening the correct pipe]
Okay Billy, give me the snake.
Give you the snake? Get your own fuckin' snake, give you the snake!
[Grabs his crotch]
I got your snake right here.
Pee Wee it's not that bad, just tell the guys that you called up all the girls in your harem and none of them wanted to do it with all those jerks.
I bet you would.
I don't have a harem.
That's not what I heard.
Do you know how I got my reputation?
How?

In the 8th grade, I didn't know anything. A bunch of guys wanted to get me to go skinny dipping, I didn't want to but I didn't care if they did so I just watched. I thought it was funny, flopping around...the next day I was a slut, the original mattress-back.
My tit! YOU BROKE MY TIT! I'm gonna sue you!

[to the Klansmen]
This zemel has been used to chop off literally hundreds of foreskins... what better to shave the heads of a bunch of pricks like you?

[as he prepares to shave the heads of the Klansmen]
We will almost certainly have to retire this zemel when this is all over!

[first lines; after recap of previous movie]
I GOT LAID!
Hey Pee Wee, how's it feel?
How does what feel?
Getting laid.
Same as it always feels.
I don't believe it.
Never again.
What are you guys talking about, I got bodies laid all over South Florida.
Morris, the last time you got any action, it was your fist. The old rosy palm.
You guys are just jealous because I ruined Wendy for everybody else.

[after the guys laugh]
Now that she's had me, what's left?
Yeah well, that's not what she told me, Pee Wee.
Well, what did she tell you?
Ask her, Pee Wee, here she comes.
Yeah, I can hear her panting from here.

Look man, when they've been had by Pee Wee Morris, they stay had. I mean, they can't keep their hands off me. You guys better watch out because when she sees me you're likely to get caught in the stampede. Watch this.

[walks by passively]
Hi, boys.

[after the guys laugh at Pee Wee]
She's in a frenzy, Pee Wee.
Yeah, she's rabid.
She didn't see me. She didn't know I was here.
That's what she said about you on the bus.
Oh man, the girl's my slave.
